description: The Cancellation Eraser is for revoking the effect of the gadget pen, Face-Doodling Pen.

jp_name: 世話やきロープ "Sewa yaki rōpu"
description: Just like the name, tihis gadget will take care of you. It can be shaped into anything, and will accompany you anywhere, anywhe without worrying about it.

The Catch Glove is a gadget that belongs to Doraemon.
It helps it's user to catch anything automatically, even if the user is not good in catching.

jp_name: チアリーダー手袋 Chiarīdā Tebukuro
description:
The gadget is actually a pair of mittens that expand into pom-poms when someone places them over (or toss them onto) their hands, and can be used by anyone. If the user cheers for another person, said person will somehow instantly win whatever competition they are currently in. They can't be removed unless the targeted person emerges victorious.
The Cheerleader Gloves is one of Shizuka's gadget as an Assist Character. When used, Shizuka appears alongside Nobita and Doraemon and cheers them along as she runs around cheering with them. While she is cheering, she gradually restores their health over time. She will follow Nobita and Doraemon around and jump across ledges with them. Note that she is vulnerable to attacks as well as falling into pits which will instantly dispatch her.
appears_in: Doraemon: Nobita's Legend of the Sun King
Nobita and the Island of Miracles ~Animal Adventure~
Summoning in Victory with the Cheerleader Gloves

jp_name: カチンカチンライト Kachinkachin Raito
description: The Coagulation Light's energy solidifies the target for 5 minutes, preventing it from experiencing any state of change for the entire duration of the effect. Solidified items may exhibit properties absent from the original counterpart.
appears_in: All the Way From the Country of the Future
Doraemon: Nobita Drifts in the Universe
All the Way From the Country of the Future
Doraemon: Nobita Drifts in the Universe

description: This gadget is used to make a fusion with something that touched after spreading the cream on hand.
This gadget grants cats the ability to attract customers. After eating Come Come Cat Food, the cat can attract customers. The effect of the gadget however, is over after attracting three customers.
appears_in: Would You Like To Adopt Doraemon?

jp_name: こいこいマーク Koi Koi Māku
description: Same as the Come Come Cat, the gadget forcefully pulls a person depending on the direction.
appears_in: Nobita and the Island of Miracles ~Animal Adventure~

jp_name: カムカムキャット Kamu Kamu Kyatto
description: This gadget makes the target come to a person's house. It can also be used to pull in people in the direction it is facing. The Come Come Cat is useful for attracting customers, in a rather 'forceful' way. Its function is the opposite of the Go Go Dog.
appears_in: Vote for the Boss of the Brats!
Doraemon: Nobita and the Island of Miracles ~Animal Adventure~

description: In Movie:Doraemon: Nobita and the Kingdom of Clouds (1979 anime)Stand by Me Doraemon (2005 anime)In Anime:The Recital of Blue Moon NightWith this, a person can walk or jump on clouds with just a spray. However, too much of this will cause the cloud to be very bouncy.
appears_in: Doraemon: Nobita and the Kingdom of Clouds
The Recital of Blue Moon Night

eng_name: Conveyor Belt Sushi of People I Wanna See
jp_name: 会(あ)いたいヒト回転(かいてん)寿司(すし) Aitai Hito Kaiten Sushi
description:
Just say the name of a person or group of people that you want to see to the microphone. They will automatically be teleported and appear on the plates of the conveyor belt. Then you can see them for a limited time. A user can do it 10 times and after that, the gadget will be useless.
When calling the person or group of people, the users have to be specific as possible to prevent a full list of people with the same name or from the same place from coming out. They will have to push the cancel button to end the list. When the person or group of people are called, their appearance the moment before they are called will be reflected on the conveyor belt (for example, Uncle Heisuke is in the middle of changing his clothes before he was called the first time). While users may deliver items to the person or group of people or receive items from them, they cannot pull them out from the conveyor belt.
Doraemon bought the gadget during the promotional period, and hence there was an extra call making the maximum number of calls allowed to 11 (Normally during the promotional period, if you buy 10 bentos of sushi you get another one free).
appears_in: Revolving Sushi of People I Wanna See

description:
The robot initially appears as a blank humanoid puppet with a red, nose-like button as its switch, used for startup and shutdown. 
It can mimic multiple attributes of its target, from appearance and physiology to psychology and sentience. On top of the accuracy deficiencies, however, it is also vulnerable to mechanical defects (impacts, etc), both of which can greatly impede its performance.
appears_in: I Don't Like Shizuka-chan Being Like This!
Doraemon: Yume Dorobou to 7 Nin no Gozansu

jp_name: 暗記 パン, Anki Pan
description:
To use the Copying Toast, one should press one side of the toast on a book with either text or pictures. The text or picture will then be 'printed' (in the bread's case, 'sticks onto it') on the toast. Eating the toast later will allow the eater to remember whatever content that has been printed on the toast.
The user will forget the content (if they never did memorize it normally) if the toasts are expelled out from their system. Like how Nobita had a stomach ache and had to 'expel' them into the toilet, he forgets everything printed on the toasts.
appears_in: Doraemon Wii: Secret Tool King Tournament

jp_name: わたがし雲メーカー Wataga shi kumo mēkā
description:
To use this gadget, the user must put it into a cloud, then add their favorite flavors, foods and even the drinks. Finally, press the button on the gadget to create it and eat these clouds.
This cotton candy is almost absent when eating, because it is naturally cloudy so users can eat as much as they like.

The user has to point the gadget at the other person and press the red button. This will make that person switch their role in life. To switch back, the user needs to press the red button again.
Humorously enough, not all the roles and actions are switched by the gadget e.g. Shizuka will be the one to scream when Nobita bathes even though she is the one who walks in at that moment.
appears_in: This Road, That Road, and The Easy Road/1979 Anime
This Road, That Road, and The Easy Road/2005 Anime
